name: Super Leapy
description:
Super Leapy

This is an early prototype of a game I'm working on, called Super Leapy.

Currently there is not much to do, only a single level, no menu, no scores, nothing.

Planned features
  • 6 levels
  • Randomly generated infinite level
  • Coins
  • Customizable ball, platforms and background
  • Shop where you can buy skins for platforms and the ball
  • Mobile support
